content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good to meet you, Ryanah. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. Could you please provide me with your budget for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 300 Euros per month. I am a student and a responsible person, so I would like to be on good terms with my landlord. Can you provide me with your rental price?
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Certainly, Ryanah. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I am willing to rent it to you for 350 Euros per month. This price includes all utilities and maintenance expenses. I believe it is a fair price considering the market rates in Mannheim.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I believe the price you are proposing is a bit high. I have a budget of 300 Euros per month. Could you lower the price to 300 Euros per month?
Thank you for your understanding.

I would also like to know if you have any requirements or conditions for the tenancy agreement?

Best regards,
Ryanah Rahman
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
I understand your concerns, Ryanah. However, the price I proposed is based on the current market rates in Mannheim and the cost of running the apartment. I am not willing to lower the price any further.

As for the tenancy agreement, I require a minimum lease term of six months. During this period, you will be responsible for paying the rent on time and maintaining the apartment in good condition. Additionally, you will need to provide me with a security deposit of one month's rent.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about these terms.
name: Heinrich Heine
